SELECT org.organization AS organizationName, db.database_name AS databaseName, db.database_status AS databaseStatus, hbase.hbase_namespace AS hbaseNamespace, hbase.hbase_status AS hbaseStatus, org.enable AS enable, org.expire_time AS expireTime FROM metadata.paas_organization AS org LEFT JOIN metadata.mgmt_database AS db ON db.database_name = org.database_name LEFT JOIN metadata.mgmt_hbase AS hbase ON hbase.hbase_namespace = org.hbase_namespace
